CREATE TABLE reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	clicks INT,
	conversions INT,
	revenue DECIMAL(10,2)
)

UPDATE reports SET clicks=100 WHERE report_id=1;

  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  ad_spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
  conversions INT,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  roi DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

UPDATE campaign_data SET ad_spend = ad_spend + 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
